price: E, assim, fizemos ver a Abraão o reino dos céus e da terra, e isso para que fosse dos convictos.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُرِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ مَلَكُوتَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِيَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُوقِنِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nurī ib'rāhīma malakūta al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waliyakūna mina al-mūqinīna
